content: single_crochet across blo single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet single_crochet increase flo in both single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet single_crochet increase single_crochet across x 3 single_crochet increase 7 single_crochet single_crochet increase single_crochet across x 3 feet make 4 in yellow 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 1 single_crochet 1 increase around single_crochet around until desired length i did 2 rounds antenna make 2 in red 3 single_crochet in magic_ring 1 single_crochet 1 increase single_crochet around until desired length for both base piece and top piece single_crochet decrease around and f/o stuff body pieces as you crochet assemble body pieces together and sew yellow parts onto bottom of belly add feet and tail end piece sew 2 antenna pieces together like a t and then add to head cut eyes out of felt and sew or hot glue on for side body circles i made chains of yellow of increasing size and then sewed them down to the body i also stuffed body part one with rice instead of stuffing and put sturdy wire through the whole body so that caterpie can balance standing up a little and be bent into a few poses
